name: BSD Quest Hand Tracked Feast
description:
This is a simple tech demo showing hand tracking on the Oculus Quest, it was developed because it is our 5th birthday at BSD and we can not celebrate in person, so enjoy some virtual food!

https://bitspacedevelopment.com/2020/5-years-of-bsd/

This requires:

  • Oculus Quest
  • Controllers or hands
  • Developer mode to install
